palindrome-string_key2: Palindrome woh `string` ya number hota hai, jo left se right aur right se left same hota hai. Jaise `nayan` `string`. Aap isse left se dekhoge toh bhi `nayan` hai, aur right se dekhoge toh bhi `nayan` hai.
palindrome-string_key3: `naina` jaise palindrome nahi hai. Left se yeh `naina` hai, par right se `anian` hai. Aur dono alag alag hai.
palindrome-string_key4: Aapko ek function likhna hai recursion use kar kar jo dekhega ki given `string` `palindrome` hai ya nahi.
palindrome-string_key6: Agar pehla aur aakhiri character list mei alag hoga, toh list palindrome nahi hai.
palindrome-string_key7: Agar pehla aur aakhiri character list mei same hai, toh list palindrome hai agar bacchi hui list (list mei agar pehla aur aakhiri element hata do toh) palindrome hai.
palindrome-string_key8: Agar list mei ek character hai, toh woh hamesha palindrome hoga.
palindrome-string_key9: Agar list mei do character hai, aur woh dono same hai toh palindrome hoga, else palindrome nahi hoga.
